name: Oyster
description: The world's first waterproof and dustproof wristwatch. It featured a hermetically sealed case which provided optimal protection for the movement.

name: Oyster Perpetual
description: The first self-winding mechanism with a Perpetual rotor. It is the heart of every modern automatic watch.

name: Datejust
description: The first self-winding waterproof chronometer wristwatch to display the date in a window on the dial.

name: Explorer
description: Created to celebrate the first successful ascent of Mount Everest. A watch that thrives in the toughest conditions.

name: Submariner
description: The first divers' watch waterproof to a depth of 100 metres (330 feet). The benchmark for divers' watches.

name: GMT-Master
description: Developed to meet the specific needs of airline pilots. It became the official watch of several airlines.

name: Day-Date
description: The first wristwatch to display the date and the day of the week spelt out in full in a window on the dial.

name: Milgauss
description: Designed to resist magnetic fields of up to 1,000 gauss, ensuring the reliability and precision of a scientific instrument.

name: Cosmograph Daytona
description: Designed to meet the demands of professional racing drivers. A high-performance chronograph and icon of the track.

name: Sea-Dweller
description: Designed for the pioneers of professional deep-sea diving. Waterproof to a depth of 610 metres (2,000 feet).

name: Yacht-Master
description: The watch of the open seas, combining style and performance for the world of sailing.

name: Sky-Dweller
description: A classic watch for world travellers, featuring a dual time zone and an annual calendar.
